meanings.definition: A person or company that operates a warehouse.
meanings.sent1: The warehousers organized the inventory efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The warehousers received a shipment of goods today.
meanings.sent3: The warehousers had a race to see who could stack boxes the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The warehousers were the unsung heroes of the supply chain.
meanings.sent5: The warehousers worked tirelessly to keep the warehouse running smoothly.

meanings.definition: The act of storing goods in a warehouse.
meanings.sent1: The warehousers involved in warehousing ensured proper storage of products.
meanings.sent2: The warehousers of the company were responsible for inventory management.
meanings.sent3: The warehousers decided to have a picnic inside the warehouse among the goods.
meanings.sent4: The importance of warehousers became clear during the busy holiday season.
meanings.sent5: The warehousers carefully labeled each item for easy retrieval.
